about_the_game:
"Beyond our own, there are other planes of existence, many completely unfathomable to the mind of man. Tonight, my work has brought me a vision of one such world... I plan to enter this place. What form I shall take, what I will leave behind - these are mysteries to me.
I do not know if I shall ever return. I am certain only of one thing: this new world calls to me,
and I must answer."

In 1876, a solitary man stands in his London laboratory, bathed in purple light. His invention, a machine with the power to open rifts in the fabric of reality, has revealed to him The Soup. This strange other dimension is home to many puzzles and mysteries- what happened to this world, what happened to its inhabitants, and what will happen to him when he enters...

Features

  • A Modern take on the classic first-person puzzle-adventure
  • Explore a mysterious world, solving puzzles and discovering its secrets
  • Multiple control schemes catering to seasoned gamers and casual players alike
  • First-class VR support, including full Oculus Touch and Vive controller support, and multiple locomotion modes
